description: When shaping the domain, collaborators must be ordered by likely call chain

examples.description: Order collaborators to reflect the sequence of interactions
examples.content: Bot Tool: Moves To Next Action If Done: Agile Bot, Project, Workflow State, Workflow - Bot Tool calls Agile Bot, which uses Project, which reads Workflow State, which uses Workflow

examples.description: Place the most direct collaborator first, followed by subsequent calls
examples.content: AI Chat: Detects Trigger Words And Routes To Tools: Human, Bot Server, Bot Tool - Human interacts with AI Chat, which routes to Bot Server, which uses Bot Tool

examples.description: Don't order collaborators alphabetically or randomly
examples.content: Bot Tool: Moves To Next Action If Done: Workflow, Agile Bot, Project, Workflow State - Alphabetical order, not call chain order
